name: So I joined the Game Jam and I couldn't finish on time so I did this
name_original: So I joined the Game Jam and I couldn't finish on time so I did this
description:
Well, what happens when you join a Game Jam for the first time and start working on your first project with a lot of time, but then, about three days later you get the notice that your school forgot to give you assignments to do, so they give them to you two weeks later, and have 11 assignments to do in 10 days and still have to upload something to the Jam?

this.

The game is incomplete, actually, there's barely anything to do yet, you only get to talk to a boring dude, and have a good ending or a bad one. Though it is like two minutes long, it's kind of funny so pay a look at it at least. What else do you want it was made in about 2 hours.

THIS IS NOT A DEMO OR IS EVEN RELATED TO THE ACTUAL GAME.

The actual game should be finished in about one week or two, then I will update the game and you will get the real game.
